Detailed Description

ObitBeamShape class function definitions.

This class is derived from the Obit base class.

ObitBeamShape* ObitBeamShapeCreate (  gchar *  name,
ObitImage *  image,
ofloat  pbmin,
ofloat  antSize,
gboolean  doGain
) 
 

Public: Create/initialize ObitBeamShape structures.

Parameters:
name An optional name for the object.
image Image for which beam shape is desired
pbmin Minimum gain, lower values will be clipped at this value
antSize Size of Antenna in (m)
doGain If true gain wanted, else gain set to 1.0
Returns:
the new object.

Public: Calculate gain in a given direction.

Simple function of distance from pointing center.
